death_text: m_c was taken by a hawk, never to be seen again.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was taken by a hawk.

death_text: m_c grew weak as the days passed, and now walks the stars of Silverpelt.
m_c fell into the river and drowned.

history_text.reg_death: m_c fell into the river and drowned.

death_text: m_c was killed when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} snuck out of camp.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} snuck out of camp.

death_text: m_c died after getting into the herb stores and accidentally eating deathberries.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} got into the herb stores and ate deathberries.

death_text: m_c was killed in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} sleep by a snake that had snuck into camp.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was killed by a snake.

death_text: m_c was too weak to fight off whitecough and died.
m_c caught a cold, slowly fading until {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} eventually passed on.
r_c and m_c die from a bout of kittencough.
r_c and m_c catch whitecough, and fade away quickly.
Greencough reaches the nursery. r_c and m_c die.

m_c excitedly follows r_c a short distance from camp to begin the promised battle training. r_c says something about how real warriors don't hold back, even in a spar. m_c nods eagerly. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} barely {VERB/m_c/have/has} time to duck as r_c's paw whistles past {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} head. The kit stumbles backwards, tripping over {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} paws, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} head landing squarely on a rock.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was killed in battle training with r_c.
history_text.reg_murder_unrevealed: m_c was killed in battle training with r_c.

death_text: m_c quietly pads after r_c, eyes bright with the promise of exploring the territory. r_c suddenly comes to a stop beside a spiky bush, pointing at it with a claw. Apparently the shiny red berries taste just like fresh prey, and r_c is offering one to m_c! The kit excitedly nods and grabs a berry with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} teeth. It's not exactly like prey... the kit's thought trails off as darkness takes over {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} vision.

history_text.reg_death: m_c ate deathberries and succumbed to the poison.
history_text.reg_murder_unrevealed: m_c was fed deathberries by r_c.

death_text: m_c sneaks out of camp, wondering what all is out there. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/come/comes} to a small stream and {VERB/m_c/attempt/attempts} to leap across. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} misjudged the distance and {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} paws scrabble on the bank for purchase. m_c is losing {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} grip when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/think/thinks} {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/catch/catches} a glimpse of r_c's pelt. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} about to call for help when {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} grip fails.

history_text.reg_death: m_c drowned in a stream while r_c watched.
